main.name: Deepak Vashisht
main.occupation: CEO of SteadyCoders || Sr Software Engineer
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React, Keen to Learn new technologies.
main.bio: My name is Deepak Kumar and I am a graduate of Computer Science with 5 years of professional Software development (Fullstack) experience. I came across your job posting here on Stackoverflow and I am happy to express my interest to the open fullstack engineer position. Since I've started my professional career back in 2015 I've already been doing fullstack development with different technologies that were mostly built in PHP and Javascript. This includes experience with different MVC frameworks like Laravel and Codeigniter, yii, as well Wordpress experience. On top of that, I also have experience working with Hybrid Apps and SPAs using Angular, Ionic and React. As far as other languages are concerned, I do have some short but valuable experience with ASP.NET, Java and(C#) as well.

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: I have more then 5 years of experience in PHP laravel, codeigniter, React.js , Anglular js, Website Development, Website design, Database Development , Web Design, Responsive design, API Integration, API Development.

projects.title: Leading Payment Processing Service Provider (React JS, Laravel)

testimonials.text: Deepak joined our software project after it had started and came up to speed very quickly. He had a good grasp off the technology, took charge of the areas he was assigned to, and was very good about asking questions so he could learn what was needed. He has become one of the most valuable members of our team and I would recommend him to anyone

I worked with Deepak on some changes to my website and he has been excellent! He is always willing to help, very prompt in responding to questions and most importantly, he gets the work done quickly and to a high standard. I am very happy to recommend him to you!

Deepak's understanding of the requirements and addressing in developing the website is very quick and his flexibility and adaptability in developing the website with changing requirements is highly appreciable

Deepak was a pleasure to work with. He rebuilt an old Wordpress site that hadn't been updated in 5 years and did everything I asked of him with no fuss. He understood everything I wanted and finished in the week timeframe set for him. A great experience.
